channel.title: The New Endeavor - Full Game World - Exciting Content - Unique Server
channel.description:
[CENTER] [URL=http://"http://www.endeavor-ps.com"][IMG]http://endeavor-ps.com/donate/end.gif[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=4][FONT=Century Gothic]
[URL=http://"http://www.endeavor-ps.com"]Latest news and updates![/URL]
[URL=http://"http://endeavor-ps.com/play/"]Webclient[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://endeavor-ps.com/forums/desktop.zip"]Downloadable client[/URL]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WO44XFd8nRA
Endeavor is back and better than ever with an all new gaming style and a new community. We're setting precedents with never before seen full world content and a free-roam style you could get use to. Explore quests, dungeons, the wilderness, 7+ mini-games. 12+ bosses, 23 functioning skills, an active economical community, and too much more to list. At Endeavor we are more than a game, we are a community. We listen to our players and post updates every 3 days patching bugs and adding new content. Why not give us a try?
This is the Lodestone Network, your key to the world. You can use it to go anywhere and to explore anything on the map. Complete with a current location marker, and a key system that gives you a description and indicates where similar locations are.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pSt2AXz.png[/img]
Here are some more pictures of the game!
[URL=http://"http://www.endeavor-ps.com"] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hloGfzd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://endeavor-ps.com/endeavormedia/1.png[/img]

item.title: The New Endeavor - Full Game World - Exciting Content - Unique Server
item.dc:creator: @Mikey_Sasse Mikey Sasse
item.description:
@Mikey_Sasse wrote:

Latest updates

X-log patched
Reduced combat timer for player combat
"this monster is already under attack" ranged error patched
you now get all levels restored and cured of poison when leaving ffa
You can now teleport above lvl 20 wild if not in combat
Water rune amount exploit fixed
Future item drop amount exploits patched automatically through logic
Combat distance patched (wouldn’t allow you to attack some large npcs on some sides)
Alching tab setting fixed
You can now access Lumbridge smelting area
You can now use an item on a Furnace and it brings up the selection interface
You can now smelt using the furnace at Lumbridge
Slayer helmet is now a full helm and mask
Red dragons are now placed in the wilderness.
Sea Troll Queen is now fully functional.
Combat styles will now correctly load on login.
Added real 562 hitmark sprite (not sure how this got undone before)
You can now pickup a spade at barrows to avoid confusion.
Fading 602 hitmarks added
In-game settings interface completed
602 context menus added
Quick prayer interfaces (curses and default) added (not functional yet)
Error with menus on mini-map fixed
Quick prayers functional for Default prayer
Quick prayers functional for Curses prayer
Magic books now save on logout
602 hitmarks now expand and contract based on the hit
Clan chat will now display a default rank for all users (working on a full system)
Clan chat will now show the owner rank for the clan owner, no rights yet
Started on the clan chat on-demand loading/saving, will finish for later release

Read full topic
item.source: The New Endeavor - Full Game World - Exciting Content - Unique Server
